title: Anime Tenchou x Touhou Project
original_name: アニメ店長 x 東方 Project
opening_song: "Iro wa Nioi e do Chirinuru wo (色は匂へど 散りぬるを)" by Yuuhei Satellite
sinopse: A collaboration anime project of Anime Tenchou and Touhou animated by ufotable. The anime was shown at the 2010 Animate Ichioshi Bishojo Anime Matsuri.
